holidays.name: World Smile Day
holidays.description: Encourages people worldwide to do acts of kindness and smile as a simple way to make the world a happier place.
holidays.origin: Started by Harvey Ball, the creator of the smiley face, the day is observed on the first Friday of October but is also celebrated informally on other dates like October 6 to spread joy.
holidays.funFact: Harvey Ball was paid only $45 for creating the iconic smiley face back in 1963, which became one of the most recognizable symbols on the planet.
